description: Theta series of direct sum of 3 copies of E_8 lattice (the Niemeier lattice of type E_8^3).
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 123, 407.
formula: This series is the q-expansion of E_4(z)^3. Cf. A004009. - Daniel Briggs, Nov 25 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
